overview.heading: What is Well-Architected Framework?
overview.body: HashiCorp Well-Architected Framework provides best practice guidance for organizations. Use it to optimize your production HashiCorp deployments while also meeting your specific architectural needs. The well-architected framework starts with the cloud operating model and moves toward cloud migration enablement.
